content: There are many researchers who are active in the field of metaethics. Some well-known philosophers who have made significant contributions to the field include Plato, Aristotle, Immanuel Kant, John Rawls, and Judith Jarvis Thomson. More recent philosophers who have made significant contributions to metaethics include Derek Parfit, Christine Korsgaard, and T.M. Scanlon. Additionally, there are many other philosophers who are currently working on research in the field of metaethics and contributing to the ongoing development of the subject.
